Portfolio

Vimeo.com Clone

User can sign in to their Vimeo account, upload a video, search for videos, and add comments to video (comments posted through our clone will post on real Vimeo website).

FamilyVideo.com Clone

User can create an account, sign in, search for items (items provided by the Movie Database API), add/delete items from their shopping cart, and empty their shopping cart by going through a check out process.

A.P.S. Website

A website for the band A.P.S. User can find information regarding the band's recorded music and events.

About

John D'Agostino

I'm a Web Developer with a B.S. in Communication from UIC, and an unparalleled drive to continue growing my skill set.

Outside of work you will find me tinkering with code, playing music, or watching b-movies.

Project Heading

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.

Startup Framework is a website builder for professionals. Startup Framework contains components and complex blocks (PSD+HTML Bootstrap themes and templates) which can easily be integrated into almost any design. All of these components are made in the same style, and can easily be integrated into projects, allowing you to create hundreds of solutions for your future projects.

You can preview Startup Framework here.
